Release Notes: Changes in the DLL will allow a series of previously not allowed null values to pass through the poller, enabling various scenarios of future inspection data to be transferred from the PPDR Mobile App to DRS. The fix will essentially allow the poller to not get stuck and proceed intaking other inspection data if these scenarios are encountered.

Corrected a tooltip not displaying for the Create Zip button. 
An error was corrected when trying to navigate to the Submit to COR 3 page.
When a user navigates an Intake, the records will not be modified in the database unless data actually changes on the forms within the application.
As a sub applicant, they will receive an email as a COR3 notification of approval or denial for my application, to inform the user of the status. Additional instructions were added to this email.
As a sub applicant, the ability to update the UI Pages are restricted by role/stage, so that fields are not updated while an application is being reviewed by COR3.

The following data updates were completed during tonight's update:
  • Internal - Remove New Expense option from Blank Forms
  • Update - Add email Notification for PW moved to  Ready for Closeout stage
  • Internal - Change data source for PW version display to XFILES FIDA data
  • Update - Add new document type, Time Extension, at Applicant level
  • Update - Remove FEMA Reimbursement from Expenses Categories
  • Update - Modify display on PW Version tab to display data for all PW version
  • Update - Rename PW Previous Versions tab to PW Version History
  • Update - Modify process to populate Vendor associated with a Contract when the Contact is associated with an Expense
  • Internal - Expand Contact Table display
  • Internal - Period of Performance Date to be updated using data in the FIDA file
  • Update - Modify "Closeout RFR" to display as "Final Payment Request" and type of request to "Final Payment Request"
  • Update - Update Doc Library to Display Archived Documents
  • Update - Update Folder Structure
  • Internal - Resolve issue with PW 910, data errors when attempting to version update via ADM
  • Internal - Update to Expense Entry

• Created a new Applicant Consultant role in order to provide ability to upload documents, add Notes and Add Communications at the project and damage levels.
  • Move several folders from Canceled stage to Active stage.
  • Corrected column grid sorting when multiple pages are presented.
  • SPDMG Admin form updated so when the user changes the filters and the previously selected damage row is no longer present, the Last FEMA Data Update field is cleared and no longer displays the date for the previously selected damage.
